description: Adversaries may interact with the Windows Registry to gather information about the system, configuration, and installed software.
name: Query Registry
query: (process.executable:*\\reg.exe AND process.command_line:(*query* OR *save* OR *export*) AND process.command_line:(*currentVersion\\windows* OR *currentVersion\\runServicesOnce* OR *currentVersion\\runServices* OR *winlogon\\* OR *currentVersion\\shellServiceObjectDelayLoad* OR *currentVersion\\runOnce* OR *currentVersion\\runOnceEx* OR *currentVersion\\run* OR *currentVersion\\policies\\explorer\\run* OR *currentcontrolset\\services*))
author: Timur Zinniatullin
oscd.community
